testcase.brief: Verify that the index range of auto gen user accounts is 1 to 9999
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: -config a ssid with ppsk -enable ppsk-server -enable mac binding
Test Procedure: 1. Generate some user accounts for the user group by index 9990 - 9999 2. Check the user accounts list. [result 1] 3. Generate some user accounts for the user group by index 1000 â€“ 1030 4. Check the user accounts list. [result 2] 5. Try to connect to the PPSK SSID using one of these user accounts. [result 3] 6. Execute this case on different platform.

step.console: -v "interface mgt0 vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "interface mgt0 native-vlan ${tb.vlan1}" -v "hive ${hive.name}" -v "hive ${hive.name} password aerohive" -v "interface mgt0 hive ${hive.name}"

step.telnet: -v "security-object ppsk" -v "security-object ppsk security protocol-suite wpa-tkip-psk ascii-key aerohive" -v "security-object ppsk security private-psk" -v "security-object ppsk security private-psk default-psk-disabled" -v "user-group ppsk_group" -v "user-group ppsk_group password-generation-method auto" -v "user-group ppsk_group auto-generation password-length 8" -v "user-group ppsk_group auto-generation prefix ppsk_" -v "user-group ppsk_group auto-generation shared-secret aerohive" -v "user-group ppsk_group cache-mode mandatory" -v "user-group ppsk_group psk-format character-pattern digits" -v "user-group ppsk_group psk-format character-pattern letters" -v "no user-group ppsk_group psk-format character-pattern special-characters" -v "user-group ppsk_group psk-format combo-pattern or" -v "user-group ppsk_group psk-generation-method password-only" -v "user-group ppsk_group vlan-id ${tb.vlan1}" -v "user-group ppsk_group user-attribute 1" -v "user-group ppsk_group reauth-interval 1800" -v "user-group ppsk_group auto-generation index-range 9990 9999"

-v "user-group ppsk_group user-attribute 1" -v "user-group ppsk_group vlan-id ${tb.vlan1}" -v "user-profile ttt vlan-id ${tb.vlan1} attribute 1" -v "no security-object ppsk security private-psk mac-binding-enable" -v "no security-object ppsk security private-psk external-server" -v "ssid ${ssid.name}" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} user-group ppsk_group" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} max-client 32" -v "ssid ${ssid.name} security-object ppsk" -v "interface wifi0 ssid ${ssid.name}"
